quiz.question: Which currency uses the name 'forint' and is used in Hungary?
Which currency features portraits of national heroes rather than monarchs on most banknotes since republican transition?
What currency is used in the Philippines?
Which currency replaced the Zimbabwean dollar after hyperinflation and before a new local currency?
Which currency was demonetized in India in 2016 as part of a move against counterfeit currency?
Which currency is issued by the Eastern Caribbean Central Bank?
Which Southeast Asian currency is issued in coins called 'sen' and notes called 'ringgit'?
What currency is used in Turkey?
Which African country uses the CFA franc issued by the West African states?
Which Scandinavian currency historically used 'öre' and 'krona' before EU-era adjustments?
Which currency is used by Japan's neighbors with a similar name but different symbol?
Which currency experienced the longest continuous gold backing in modern history influencing global trade?
Which currency was part of a successful currency board arrangement in Hong Kong maintaining a tight peg to the US dollar?
